Class RefundStatus

Provides a list of the possible states for a refund transaction, and details of each status.

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

Declined

The 'Declined' status indicating the refund was refused or could not be processed due to insufficient funds etc.

Declaration
public static TransactionStatus Declined { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
TransactionStatus
Remarks

The bank API declined refund request e.g. due to insufficient merchant/gateway funds, or other business logic.

This is a 'final' status.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Error

The bank responded to refund request with a system error

Declaration
public static TransactionStatus Error { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
TransactionStatus
Remarks

Bank responded to refund request with a system error

This is a 'final' status.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Refunded

The 'Refunded' status indicates a successful refund.

Declaration
public static TransactionStatus Refunded { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
TransactionStatus
Remarks

Bank API has responded to refund request with success code.

This is a final status.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Unsubmitted

The 'unsubmitted' status.

Declaration
public static TransactionStatus Unsubmitted { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
TransactionStatus
Remarks

Created but not yet received by bank API; could occur if bank API becomes unavailable.

Possible states following this one; Refunded, Declined, Error

FromString(String)

Returns a TransactionStatus instance from the provided string containing the name of the status.

Declaration
public static TransactionStatus FromString(string status)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String status

A string containing a value that matches a Name for a status that is valid for a refund.
Returns
Type Description
TransactionStatus

A TransactionStatus instance.
Exceptions
Type Condition
OnlineEftposInvalidDataException

Thrown if status does not match any known status.
